wikipedia_page.main: Jill Gallard  is a British diplomat who took up the post of British Ambassador to Germany in November 2020. Previously she was the British Ambassador to Portugal, director of human resources at the Foreign and Commonwealth Office and deputy political director at the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.

link_mentions.page: List of diplomats of the United Kingdom to Germany
Embassy of the United Kingdom, Berlin
response: The British Embassy in Berlin () is the United Kingdom's diplomatic mission to Germany. It is located on 70-71 Wilhelmstraße, near the Hotel Adlon, in Berlin. The current ambassador is Jill Gallard.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Portugal

response: In July 2020 it was announced that he would retire from the Diplomatic Service in November, and be succeeded by Jill Gallard as Ambassador to Germany.
In June 2014 Hayes was appointed to be British Ambassador to Portugal in succession to Jill Gallard. She took up the appointment in September 2014. She was replaced in the summer of 2018.
* Jill Gallard - For services to the Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
